message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $250. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for it. After considering its value, I believe $180 would be a fair price for me to purchase it.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I appreciate your consideration. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $220. It's a great product, and I think it's worth a bit more than $180. Let me know what you think!

I understand your perspective, Alice. While I respect your valuation, I would like to propose $200 as the price for the product. This still allows me to stay within my budget while acknowledging the value you place on it.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to compromise! I'm willing to meet you halfway and consider $210. It's still a great deal for both of us, and I think it's a fair price for the product. Let me know what you think!

I'm glad we're able to discuss this further, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose $205 as the price for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between our positions.

Hi Bob, I'm getting close to accepting your offer, but I still think I can get a bit more for the product. I'm willing to go up to $215. It's still a great deal for you, and I think it's worth it for the product. Let me know what you think!

Alice, I appreciate your persistence in valuing the product. After careful consideration, I am willing to pay $210 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise and keeps me within my budget.
